body_html:
As the second error message suggests, you can only multiply a Variable with an equivalent python number type (float in this case) or another Variable.

The first error message looks a little funky and could be a bug. I tried it out on master and it looks like this:

so it is consistent with the second error message.

body:
As the second error message suggests, you can only multiply a Variable with an equivalent python number type (float in this case) or another Variable.

The first error message looks a little funky and could be a bug. I tried it out on master and it looks like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/32379123-0c25714e-c083-11e7-8c48-11e97e7f010b.png)
so it is consistent with the second error message.
